location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Copy of letter No 4/3 of 1873 from Colonel Lewis Pelly, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, on Special Duty with the Zanzibar and Muscat Mission, at Aden, to His Excellency Sir Henry Bartle Edward Frere, On Special Duty with the Zanzibar and Muscat Mission, Aden

mods.abstract: Letter submitting copies of correspondence concerning Pelly's movements and the appointment of Lieutenant Edward Mockler as Acting Assistant Political Agent at Gwadur [Gwadar].The correspondence referred to is no longer enclosed with the letter.
